- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Elaine, Thanks so much for the update. Good luck with the house! Have a wonderful weekend, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Elaine Oberman [mailto:eoberman@aol.com] Sent: Friday, March 16, 2012 5:55 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Elaine Oberman Hi Sara...Quick update--have decided to take some time off before I look for the next contract. I am doing some work on the house and need the bandwidth to supervise contractors. Thanks for touching base and sending resources that will definitely interest me once I have time to sit down and focus. Elaine
Sent from my Samsung Epic 4G
Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello Elaine, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going? Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one:
http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xMzYmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTEzNiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMjY4NTM3NDQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ3MTkzNDMmZW1haWxpZD1lb2Jlcm1hbkBhb2wuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMTc5Ny05MzcyMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx6OsvWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, theres real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xMzYmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTEzNiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMjY4NTM3NDQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ3MTkzNDMmZW1haWxpZD1lb2Jlcm1hbkBhb2wuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0xMTc5Ny05MzcyMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx6OsvWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent.
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com></htm
